      • equals

        public boolean equals(Domino domino)
        Check if 2 domino pices are equal. Two domino pieces are considered equal if they have the same values independently of the side.
        Parameters:
        domino - the domino to which it is compared.
        Returns:
        ture if the dominos are equal, false otherwise.

      • isDouble

        public boolean isDouble()
        Check if the piece is a double. A piece is a double if the left value is equal to the right side.
        Returns:
        true if it is double. False otherwise.
